headline: Show HN: I've made an app to monitor and remind when ETH gas fee is low
description:
Most of us are aware that the gas charge for ETH transactions is exorbitant, but what if you could track the gas fee in realtime straight on your desktop and save money by being notified of the gas fee that best suits your needs.

Here is how it looks like https://photos.app.goo.gl/iD3My9Lm8vH9E7LF9

The app can be downloaded from here: https://ethgas.carrd.co/

The next update will provide the best time to buy.

Any feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我做了一个应用程序来监测和提醒ETH气体费用低的时候
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我做了一個應用程序來監測和提醒ETH氣體費用低的時候
description_zh-Hans:
Most of us are aware that the gas charge for ETH transactions is exorbitant, but what if you could track the gas fee in realtime straight on your desktop and save money by being notified of the gas fee that best suits your needs.

The app can be downloaded from here: https://ethgas.carrd.co/
